article_title: Western Wildfires Run Rampant, Residents Evacuate
article_text:
Farther south, the Chiwaukum Creek Fire sent a smoke plume 25,000 feet in the air near Leavenworth, Washington, the AP reported.

Fire officials warned residents of 860 homes that they should evacuate, and another 800 were under less immediate threat.

article_metadata.title: Western Wildfires Run Rampant, Residents Evacuate

og.description: Weather won't aid firefighters in Washington state.
